roleset.name: utter a sibilant or hissing sound.
roleset.note: SIBILATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. Member of Vncls manner_speaking-37.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from sibilate.01-v)

example.name: with utterance, by Ray Bradbury
example.text: ["It has been no easy thing to come forth on land,"]-1 he sibilated *trace*-1.

example.name: all args
example.text: You roared your wretchedness out and angry voices sibilated at you to keep mum.
